directions: Whisk together vinegar, sugar, and salt in a large bowl until sugar and salt are dissolved, then whisk in oil, caraway, and pepper. Add cabbages and toss well. Let stand, uncovered, at room temperature, tossing occasionally, until wilted, about 1 hour. Core apple, then cut into thin matchsticks and toss with slaw.
ingredients: 1 pound red cabbage, cored and thinly sliced (4 cups)
1 pound green cabbage, cored and thinly sliced (4 cups)
title: Red and Green Cabbage Slaw with Caraway
